description: The Whitesky Vco pulumi Provider enables you to manipulate resources in your vco portal.
name: vco

vco:base:Cloudspace.description:
A Cloudspace is an isolated Virtual Network (Layer 2) where you can deploy cloud resources.
 The user may create three types of cloudspaces:
Public Cloudspace: The Cloudspace is connected to an external network such as the Internet or your company network.
Nested Cloudspace: The Cloudspace is connected to another cloudspace in the same location.
Private Cloudspace: The Cloudspace is isolated with no connections.

url.description: The Portal URL where the resource needs to be deployed.

customerID.description: The name of the customer that will be used.

private_network.description: Specify a range of ip addresses for the private network of the cloudspace.

external_network_id.description: The id of the external network to be used.

private.description: Specify wether the resource will public or private.

host.description: Add a host to the resource.

local_domain.description: Specify a local domain for the resource.

vcpu_quota.description: Specify wether the resource will public or private.

vdisk_space_quota.description: Quota for vdisk space. set -1 for infinite.

memory_quota.description: Quota for memory. set -1 for infinite.

public_ip_quota.description: Quota for public ip. set -1 for infinite.

parent_cloudspace_id.description: The cloudspace to connect to in case of a nested cloudspace.

image_id.description: Image to use as a custom firewall.

cdrom_id.description: CDrom to use a source for a custom firewall.

type.description: OS to be used for a custom firewall.

disk_size.description: Disk size to be used for a custom firewall.

vcpus.description: Amount of vcpu's to be used for a custom firewall.

memory.description: Amount of memory to be used for a custom firewall.

url.description: The Portal URL where the resource needs to be deployed.

customerID.description: The name of the customer that is used.

private_network.description: A range of ip addresses for the private network of the cloudspace.

external_network_id.description: The id of the external network to be used.

external_network_ip.description: Default public ip address of the created cloudspace..

local_domain.description: Specify a local domain for the resource.
